name: Lumin
description: Smarter Workflows for Files and Signatures
long_description: This extension empowers developers to build smarter, more automated document workflows. Access user profiles, browse workspaces, and manage signature requests from start to finish—sending, retrieving, or canceling with ease. Upload documents on demand and convert Markdown into high-quality PDFs in seconds. Designed for seamless integration, these tools reduce friction and simplify how files, signatures, and collaboration flow through any Model Context Protocol–powered system.

tools.description: Get Signature Request by id on Lumin

tools.name: cancel_signature_request_on_lumin_by_id
tools.description: Cancel Signature Request by id on Lumin

tools.name: send_signature_request_on_lumin
tools.description: Creates and sends a new Signature Request with the submitted documents

tools.name: lumin_markdown2pdf
tools.description: Converts markdown template to PDF url
